objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Rose Gold Plated
• Pink Drop Wreath Design
• 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 71 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner showcases an elegant and modern aesthetic promoting a pair of rose gold stud earrings. It features a four-quadrant layout with subtle pastel backgrounds and delicate decorative accents like soft wave patterns and circular shadows for added depth. The top-left quadrant starts with a bold brand name (`heading`) followed by a stylized subheading (`subheading`) and product category (`tagline`). The central-right space highlights the product (`product_image`)—a stylized floral design earring garnished with crystals. The bottom-left area presents essential product features (`description`), pricing (`price`), and a strong call-to-action button (`cta`) on a colored rectangle (`cta_background`). The theme utilizes a feminine and soft color palette enhancing the product’s luxurious appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- #FFE6E6 (Soft Pink)
- #F9D5D3 (Peach Pink)
- #F8C3B7 (Muted Coral)
- #FFEAE5 (Blush)
- #C25B57 (Rosewood - CTA & Heading)
- #E37F78 (Muted Rose - Subheading)
- #A04A46 (Rich Brown - Tagline)
- #8E3632 (Muted Maroon - Description)
- #FFFFFF (White - CTA text)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings that use a delicate color palette consisting primarily of rose gold, soft pink, and brilliant white. The rose gold (#EFA3A3) forms the structural base of the earrings, lending them a luxurious and warm tone. Soft pink (#F7C9CC) is subtly used on the larger petal-shaped elements to introduce a feminine and graceful touch. The brilliance of the clear crystals (#FFFFFF) and their sparkling highlights (#E3E3E3) create contrast and visual interest, making each piece stand out. These tones harmoniously blend, enhancing the product’s elegance while emphasizing sparkle and sophistication in an ad banner.
